channel.title: Cinemark on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Cinemark Sees Quarterly Revenue, Earnings Jump on Strong Summer Box Office
item.description: “We remain highly encouraged about the trajectory of our industry,” CEO Sean Gamble said while releasing his company’s second quarter earnings results.
